General.Name: Kweichow Moutai Co Ltd
General.Description: Kweichow Moutai Co., Ltd. produces and sells liquor products in China and internationally. It offers liquors under the Kweichow Moutai, Moutai Wangzi liquor, Moutai 1935 liquor, Han Jiang liquor, and Lai Mao liquor brands. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Renhuai, China. Kweichow Moutai Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Kweichow Moutai Distillery (Group) Co., Ltd.
